alert.note: Alert for Elko (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 10 at 4:51PM PDT until August 11 at 12:00AM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM PDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of northeast Nevada, including the following county, Elko. * WHEN...Until 645 PM PDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 451 PM PDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 0.7 and 1.2 inches of rain have fallen. - This includes the following streams and drainages... Fourmile Creek, Chimney Creek, Willow Creek, Desert Ranch Reservoir, Wolf Creek, Lake Creek and Milligan Creek. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... mainly rural areas of Northwestern Elko County - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
